name: memodrops-backoffice
description: MemoDrops Backoffice - Sistema de coleta e processamento de editais

scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.json && mkdir -p dist/db && cp src/db/schema.sql dist/db/ && mkdir -p dist/db/migrations && cp src/db/migrations/*.sql dist/db/migrations/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r public dist/
scripts.build:minimal: tsc src/server-minimal.ts --outDir dist --module esnext --target es2022 --moduleResolution bundler --esModuleInterop
scripts.build:v1: tsc src/server-test-v1.ts --outDir dist --module esnext --target es2022 --moduleResolution bundler --esModuleInterop
scripts.build:v2: tsc -p tsconfig.json && cp -r src/db/migrations dist/db/ 2>/dev/null || true
